This is the QS-SAMPA current keyboard layout - not sure how it is going to display on the web, but hopefully it will look OK if you have ThothSampa font installed.

I have a few issues on this layout. I would like to see more logical assignments for eg:

1. {Q} which for me should be on the 'O' key
2. {K} which logically should be on the 'K' key
3. Oil appears to be a duplicated on 'q' and 'R'
4. 'i' and 'I' have been swapped from Jerome.  IMHO Jerome is more logical.
5. I can't see the namer dot in this keyboard.

I am aware that I can design my own keyboard layout, but that is not as satisfactory in my opinion as arriving at more logical assignments.

 I find 12pt to be difficult to read though I can't fault your sizing compared to TO.  The above is 16pt and is at a size that I find comfortable (and its not just because of my age lol).

regards

Moira
